channel.title: HL PS2 Hazard Course intro
channel.description:
For anyone who is interested I have ported over the PlayStation 2 exclusive intro of the Half-Life 1 Hazard Course over to PC. Integrated seamlessly into the standard Hazard Course. Now this lost section of the course is no longer exclusive the PS2.
https://www.moddb.com/games/half-life/addons/half-life-ps2-hazard-course-intro

item.title: HL PS2 Hazard Course intro
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
Yeah no problem! and if you guys are interested I’ve also ported over other some other HL PS2 content including the head-to-head multiplayer maps in my Half-Life Deathmatch collection on moddb.

Mod DB

Valve/Gearbox HL:DM Collection (FIXED!) addon - Half-Life

Update May 9th, 2018: Replaced dm_pumpkin and dm_santa with the proper original released models from Valve, rather than the community edited versions. UPDATE: THIS IS A REUPLOAD OF MY THE SAME COLLECTION; THIS TIME WITH WORKING PLAYER MODELS! This...

(not all of the things in this pack were ported or made by me though; such as the player models)

item.title: HL PS2 Hazard Course intro
item.dc:creator: uniquenewyorke
item.description:
Wow. I’m flashing back to being in the 5th grade, stuffing my face with liquorice and popcorn at a friend’s house, trying to beat HL on the PS2. Good stuff.

Ported straight from the Playstation 2 version of Half-Life comes the Half-Life hazard course special intro! No longer will this special section of the hazard course be PS2 exclusive! Enjoy!
